data.prayer: Lord, make the 133,676 believers in Montserrado to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 1,011,124 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Montserrado, Liberia

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Montserrado, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Montserrado, Liberia to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Montserrado.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Maninka, Eastern people. 0.3% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 1,144,800 people living in Montserrado, Liberia. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Montserrado to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.section_summary:
the state of Montserrado, Liberia has a population of 1,144,800.

We estimate Montserrado has 133,676 people who might know Jesus, 324,512 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 686,612 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 8 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Montserrado to agree with you and with one another.
